医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
太空旅行通过改变白细胞的基因表达来削弱免疫系统越来越多的证据表明，宇航员在太空中更容易受到感染。例如，国际空间站（ISS）上的宇航员经常患有皮疹以及呼吸系统和非呼吸系统疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230624/Space-travel-weakens-immune-system-by-altering-gene-expression-in-white-blood-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230624/Space-travel-weakens-immune-system-by-altering-gene-expression-in-white-blood-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f4d6d92-ed69-4294-b229-280264b29f51 Sat, 24 Jun 2023 06:11:00 -0400 Space travel weakens immune system by altering gene expression in white blood cells
突破性发现可能会带来脑转移的新疗法当从体内开始的癌症转移到大脑时，它几乎总是致命的，部分原因是治疗选择很少。现在，Wistar科学家在《自然通讯》上发表的一项新研究表明，一种称为星形胶质细胞的脑细胞通过招募特定的免疫细胞亚群在促进脑转移方面发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230624/Breakthrough-discovery-could-lead-to-new-treatments-for-brain-metastases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230624/Breakthrough-discovery-could-lead-to-new-treatments-for-brain-metastases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2f1cab9-2744-4a07-b900-fcddb90b3070 Sat, 24 Jun 2023 06:08:00 -0400 Breakthrough discovery could lead to new treatments for brain metastases
分析显示，2 型糖尿病在临床试验中经常被忽视对美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 官方记录的最新分析显示，2021 年只有 365,000 人参加了 2 型糖尿病临床试验，尽管美国有 3,730 万人患有这种疾病，即超过 11%的人口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230624/Type-2-diabetes-is-frequently-overlooked-in-clinical-trials-analysis-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230624/Type-2-diabetes-is-frequently-overlooked-in-clinical-trials-analysis-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd56f926-2c0c-483d-ad4d-9dffecbfab8d Sat, 24 Jun 2023 06:04:00 -0400 Type 2 diabetes is frequently overlooked in clinical trials, analysis reveals
采用 30 岁生日基因谱测试可以挽救生命并减少 NHS 成本美国医学杂志《内科医学年鉴》上发表的一项新研究为 30 岁时进行全民基因检测提供了强有力的理由。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230624/Adopting-a-30th-birthday-genic-profile-test-could-save-lives-and-NHS-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230624/Adopting-a-30th-birthday-genic-profile-test-could-save-lives-and-NHS-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e2a6163-c422-49a1-81a4-444b3a5deb98 Sat, 24 Jun 2023 06:01:00 -0400 Adopting a 30th birthday genetic profile test could save lives and NHS costs
FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific 提供 Presagen Life Whisperer 平台的扩展功能，以帮助 IVF 临床决策添加了基于人工智能的遗传学软件模块，以提供胚胎遗传完整性和临床妊娠可能性的客观评分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230624/FUJIFILM-Irvine-Scientific-offers-expanded-capability-of-Presagene28099s-Life-Whisperer-Platform-to-aid-with-clinical-decision-making- IVF 内.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230624/FUJIFILM-Irvine-Scientific-offers-expanded-capability-of-Presagene28099s-Life-Whisperer-Platform-to-aid-with-clinical-decision-making- in-IVF.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ba6bb58-4bf6-408d-a299-b6f51d64bfe8 Sat, 24 Jun 2023 05:38:00 -0400 FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific offers expanded capabilities of Presagen’s Life Whisperer Platform to aid with clinical decision-making in IVF
世卫组织任命凡妮莎·克里博士为总干事气候变化与健康特使世界卫生组织（WHO）很高兴地宣布任命凡妮莎·克里博士为首任总干事气候变化与健康特使。 Seed Global Health 首席执行官克里博士是一位著名的全球卫生专家和医学博士，他将在扩大世卫组织的气候和健康信息并开展高级别宣传方面发挥关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230624/WHO-appoints-Dr-Vanessa-Kerry-as-Director-General-Special-Envoy-for-Climate-Change-and-Health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230624/WHO-appoints-Dr-Vanessa-Kerry-as-Director-General-Special-Envoy-for-Climate-Change-and-Health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8a1ada6-1a76-4223-a4ac-280c35cb5068 Sat, 24 Jun 2023 03:30:00 -0400 WHO appoints Dr Vanessa Kerry as Director-General Special Envoy for Climate Change and Health
关于治疗诊断学教育的挑战和机遇的新白皮书来自全球 12 个核医学组织的领导人发布了一份关于治疗诊断学教育的挑战和机遇的白皮书。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/New-white-paper-on-challenges-and-opportunities-in-theranostics-education.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/New-white-paper-on-challenges-and-opportunities-in-theranostics-education.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6dbfad88-621f-4d3b-b5e9-f467eb752687 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 23:06:00 -0400 New white paper on challenges and opportunities in theranostics education
研究揭示青少年压力引起的产后社会行为背后的神经回路青春期的压力会导致女性和其他哺乳动物的产后行为变化，包括抑郁症和孩子出生后社会行为的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Study-reveals-neural- Circuits-underlying-adolescent-stress-induced-postpartum-social-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Study-reveals-neural- Circuits-underlying-adolescent-stress-induced-postpartum-social-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b03a3929-51bc-4c38-ba04-7b286e138b72 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 23:01:00 -0400 Study reveals neural circuits underlying adolescent stress-induced postpartum social behavior
纽约大学朗格尼分校哈森菲尔德儿童医院：儿科心脏病学和心脏手术护理领域的领导者根据本周发布的《美国新闻与世界报道》年度“最佳儿童医院”指南中的全国专科排名，纽约大学朗格尼分校的哈森菲尔德儿童医院在儿科心脏病学和心脏手术护理方面在纽约排名最高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Hassenfeld-Childrens-Hospital-at-NYU-Langone-A-leader-in-pediatric-cardiology-and-heart-surgery-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Hassenfeld-Childrens-Hospital-at-NYU-Langone-A-leader-in-pediatric-cardiology-and-heart-surgery-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c630e95-6b02-4551-acc7-de3d8e413932 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 22:53:00 -0400 Hassenfeld Children's Hospital at NYU Langone: A leader in pediatric cardiology and heart surgery care
UA 研究人员开发出监测虚弱症状的新方法外行人可能会认为“脆弱”只是“软弱”或“脆弱”的同义词。但在医学领域，虚弱是一个特定术语，指的是由于炎症和激素变化等因素，患者缺乏生理储备，或承受压力的能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/UA-researcher-develops-new-method-to-monitor-frailty-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/UA-researcher-develops-new-method-to-monitor-frailty-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e7fda0d-aefa-43c4-a49d-b05fcc075a78 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 22:50:00 -0400 UA researcher develops new method to monitor frailty symptoms
